Name: 角斗士学院（Gladiator School）
About the game: This game is an AVG game of character adventure cultivation. Character adventure cultivation is a role-playing game in which unit players immerse themselves. Players can play the protagonist, interact with the characters in the game, read the story, influence the plot through different options, and finally achieve various endings.
